item.title: Azul 债务谈判加速通过破产保护进行融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西航空公司 Azul SA 正在与债权人就一笔约 6 亿美元的融资进行深入谈判，这笔融资将为该公司提供资金，以渡过可能最快于下周破产的难关。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul SA is in advanced talks with creditors for a roughly $600 million financing that would fund the company through a potential bankruptcy that could come as soon as next week, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 主要银行家离职后，道明银行加拿大债券排名下滑
item.description: 短短几个月内，多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）在加拿大债券承销商中的排名因固定收益专业人士的出走而跌至同业垫底。【原文：In just a few months, Toronto-Dominion Bank’s ranking among Canadian bond underwriters has dropped to close to the bottom among its peers, after an exodus of fixed-income professionals.】

item.title: 微软在与 Snowflake 和 Databricks 的竞争中吹嘘销售额
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）表示，在与Snowflake Inc.和Databricks Inc.等竞争对手的竞争中，该公司以数据为重点的产品Fabric正在迅速赢得客户。【原文：Microsoft Corp. said its data-focused product, Fabric, is rapidly picking up customers in competition with rivals including Snowflake Inc. and Databricks Inc.】

item.title: 马来西亚安瓦尔称美国贸易谈判不受中国关系影响
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）说，美国承诺将 "同情地 "审查马来西亚要求降低关税的呼吁，尽管这个东南亚国家正寻求加强与华盛顿的头号竞争对手中国的关系。【原文：Malaysia’s Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said the US pledged to “sympathetically” review its appeal for lower tariffs even as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to strengthen its ties with Washington’s top competitor China.】

item.title: 米莱补贴削减后，阿根廷富人面临更高的能源账单
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统将削减对大布宜诺斯艾利斯地区所有豪宅社区的能源补贴，此举将打击阿根廷上层社会中的一部分人，他们多年来一直只需支付一小部分燃气和电费。【原文：President Javier Milei will cut energy subsidies for all gated communities in the greater Buenos Aires region, a move that will hit a portion of Argentina’s upper class that for years has been paying a fraction of their gas and electric bills.】

item.title: 夏洛特斥资 3.07 亿美元改造蓬勃发展的机场
item.description: 北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市随着新居民的增加、航空交通量的上升和经济的膨胀而蓬勃发展。现在，该市正求助于市政债券市场，以确保其机场能够跟上发展步伐。【原文：Charlotte, North Carolina, is booming with new residents, rising air traffic and a swelling economy. Now, the city is turning to the municipal bond market to make sure its airport can keep up.】

item.title: 亚马逊首席执行官称，尽管加征关税，但客户需求和价格保持稳定
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.首席执行官安迪-贾西（Andy Jassy）表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）今年早些时候推出的关税措施，该在线零售商还没有看到消费者支出有任何明显的减少或价格上涨。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said the online retailer hasn’t seen any meaningful reduction in consumer spending or an increase in prices as a result of tariffs introduced by US President Donald Trump earlier this year.】

item.title: 即使没有公报，法国也希望在七国集团会议上与美国取得进展
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴德（Eric Lombard）表示，即使未来两天的官员会议无法发表最终公报，七国集团也可以在解决与美国在贸易等分歧问题上的分歧方面取得进展。【原文：France’s finance chief Eric Lombard said the Group of Seven can make progress on resolving differences with the US on divisive issues including trade, even if officials meeting over the next two days fail to deliver a final communique.】

item.title: 美国将继续限制中国芯片市场，拒绝英伟达的宽松呼吁
item.description: 一位白宫高级官员表示，特朗普政府将继续努力，不让先进的人工智能技术落入中国之手，婉拒了英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）呼吁放宽对世界第二大经济体的芯片出口限制。【原文：The Trump administration will maintain efforts to keep advanced artificial intelligence technology out of China’s hands, a top White House official said, brushing off calls from Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang to ease restrictions on chip exports to the world’s second largest economy.】

item.title: OpenAI 将以 65 亿美元收购苹果老将 Jony Ive 旗下的人工智能初创公司
item.description: OpenAI 将以近 65 亿美元的全股票交易收购苹果公司资深设计师乔尼-艾维（Jony Ive）共同创办的人工智能设备初创公司，与这位传奇设计师联手进军硬件领域。【原文：OpenAI will acquire the AI device startup co-founded by Apple Inc. veteran Jony Ive in a nearly $6.5 billion all-stock deal, joining forces with the legendary designer to make a push into hardware.】

item.title: 南非央行副行长称通胀目标过宽
item.description: 南非储备银行副行长Fundi Tshazibana表示，人们普遍认为该国3%至6%的通胀目标区间过宽。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Deputy Governor Fundi Tshazibana said there is broad agreement that the country’s 3% to 6% inflation target range is too wide.】

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所（LME）搬迁后，芝加哥商品交易所（CME）正在洽谈设立香港仓库事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，交易所运营商芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：Exchange operator CME Group Inc. has held talks with Hong Kong authorities to add it to its aluminum contracts physical delivery network, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济衰退迫在眉睫，美国银行建议客户押注墨西哥比索
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）建议客户押注墨西哥比索兑欧元的跌势，并警告风险包括国内经济衰退和对来自美国的汇款征税的提议。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is telling clients to bet on declines in Mexico’s peso against the euro, warning of risks including an economic downturn at home and a proposed tax on remittances from the US.】

item.title: 微软在网络拉网行动中查获与勒索软件有关的域名
item.description: 热图详细显示了 Lumma 恶意软件在全球的传播情况以及在 Windows 设备上的遭遇情况。【原文：Heat map detailing global spread of Lumma malware infections and encounters across Windows devices.】

item.title: 贝莱德在 1600 亿美元模型投资组合中加入人工智能股票赌注
item.description: 由于关税的不确定性，这家全球最大的资产管理公司正在其美国模式投资组合中增加对人工智能的押注，同时降低整体股票风险。【原文：The world’s largest asset manager is adding to bets on the artificial intelligence within its US model portfolios while trimming its overall equity risk because of tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 拉各斯初创企业吸引的资金增加了 42%，逆转了非洲经济放缓的趋势
item.description: 由于 Flutterwave Inc. 和 Interswitch Ltd. 等企业的出现，尼日利亚商业中心拉各斯的初创企业去年吸引的投资增加了 42%，展示了该市作为新企业中心的吸引力。【原文：Startups in Nigeria’s commercial hub of Lagos attracted 42% more investment last year, as the presence of businesses such as Flutterwave Inc. and Interswitch Ltd. showcased the city’s appeal as a hub for new enterprises.】

item.title: LMArena 从学术项目到价值 6 亿美元的初创公司
item.description:
一项始于加州大学伯克利分校、旨在为人工智能模型排序的努力已经从包括安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）在内的投资者那里筹集到了 1 亿美元。【原文：

An effort that began at UC Berkeley as a way to rank AI models has raised $100 million from investors including Andreessen Horowitz. 

】

item.title: LVMH 集团被指警告中国困境将导致奢侈品市场持续疲软
item.description: 据知情人士透露，奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）今年前三个月的收入未达预期，因此该集团警告投资者和分析师，需求依然疲软。【原文：LVMH is warning investors and analysts that demand remains soft after the luxury conglomerate missed revenue estimates for the first three months of the year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 大豆减税政策结束，米莱（Milei）在为农民解困的努力中磕磕绊绊
item.description: 在决定将大豆出口税提高约七个百分点之后，哈维尔-米莱伊总统释放阿根廷陷入困境的农民的誓言开始动摇。【原文：President Javier Milei’s vow to unleash Argentina’s beleaguered farmers is faltering after a decision to raise taxes on soy exports by about seven percentage points.】

item.title: 财报发布后，Palo Alto 跌至一年来最低点
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 公司周三短暂下跌至一年多来的最低点，一天前这家网络安全公司发布的展望未能完全缓解对增长的担忧。【原文：Palo Alto Networks Inc. briefly tumbled to its lowest in more than a year on Wednesday, a day after the cybersecurity company gave an outlook that failed to fully ease growth concerns.】

item.title: X 发布假总统死讯后，坦桑尼亚关闭了互联网
item.description: X 社交网络平台上的多个政府账户被入侵后，坦桑尼亚限制了互联网访问。【原文：Tanzania restricted internet access after several government accounts on the X social network platform were compromised.】

item.title: 围绕美国法规的乐观情绪使比特币升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在美国推进稳定币立法后，比特币创下了历史新高，这激起了人们对唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的监管明朗化的希望。【原文：Bitcoin hit an all-time high after the advancement of stablecoin legislation in the US stoked hopes of regulatory clarity under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 安大略省将斥资 22 亿美元加强土著居民在采矿业中的作用
item.description: 安大略省政府将斥资近 31 亿加元（22 亿美元）鼓励原住民参与采矿业，以期在这个加拿大人口最多的省份提高关键矿物的产量。【原文：The Ontario government will spend nearly C$3.1 billion ($2.2 billion) to encourage Indigenous participation in the mining industry, in a bid to ramp up critical minerals production across Canada’s most populous province.】

item.title: 国债收益率攀升，20 年期国债拍卖将以 5%的利率进行
item.description: 投资者对美国融资需求增长的焦虑加剧了国债的抛售，在新的 20 年期国债拍卖之前，国债的较长到期日超过了 5%。【原文：Treasuries extended a selloff fueled by investor anxiety about the growth in the US’s financing need, propelling longer maturities beyond 5% ahead of an auction of new 20-year bonds.】

item.title: 太空初创公司 Iceye 加大波兰投资以满足军队需求
item.description: 芬兰先进对地观测卫星制造商 Iceye Oy 公司计划在波兰进一步投资，因为该公司看到希望提高太空情报收集能力的国家的需求在增加。【原文：Iceye Oy, the Finnish maker of advanced Earth-observation satellites, plans further investments in Poland as it sees increased demand from countries that want to improve their intelligence-gathering capabilities in space.】

item.title: 利比亚燃料进口欠款高达 10 亿美元，供应面临风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，利比亚在大约三个月前结束了一项有争议的石油易货贸易计划后，拖欠其燃料供应商的款项已高达约 10 亿美元。【原文：Libya has piled up about $1 billion of arrears to its fuel suppliers after the country ended a controversial oil barter program about three months ago, according to people familiar with the matter】

item.title: 杰富瑞在新兴市场招聘员工以促进销售和交易
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is hiring industry veterans to bolster its emerging markets team after several high-profile traders and salespeople left in a shakeup earlier this year.】

item.title: 欧盟为与美国达成协议准备新贸易提案
item.description: 预计欧盟将与美国分享一份修订后的贸易提案，因为欧盟希望在人们对能否达成跨大西洋协议仍持怀疑态度的情况下，为与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府的谈判注入动力。【原文：The European Union was expected to share a revised trade proposal with the US, as it aims to inject momentum in talks with President Donald Trump’s administration amid lingering skepticism that a transatlantic deal can be reached.】

item.title: 跨越关键点位后加拿大股市有望进一步上涨
item.description: 投资者和市场观察人士预计，加拿大股市将进一步走高，此前主要股票基准指数已连续 10 天上涨，并于周二首次收于关键门槛之上。【原文：Investors and market-watchers expect Canadian stocks to gain further after a major stock benchmark rode a 10-day winning streak to close above a key threshold on Tuesday, for the first time.】
